name: Expenses Personnel and Public Board Members
text: §386-155  Expenses.  All litigation expenses, including but not limited to court costs, attorneys' fees, and witness fees incurred by the director in preparation, prosecution, or defense of any action brought on behalf of or against the special compensation fund shall be paid from the fund.  Administrative expenses for the protection and preservation of the special compensation fund shall also be paid from the fund. [L 1969, c 21, §1; am L 2000, c 103, §1]
